input.sentences: traveling through location was going smoothly
there were cool sights to see | and some creepy ones too .
mom and son took breaks throughout the day and soaked in the day .
they saw some excellent performances too .
the day ended with the perfect sunset .
output.sentences: Our trip to Disneyland: Tiblisi started off with several rounds of Vodka we brought from home.
We we got stuck for 45 minutes on the It's a Terrifying World, After All ride.
Shaken, we relaxed by the book-burning bonfire to steady our nerves.
Refreshed, we enjoyed a concert by Georgia's premier polka trio, The Borscht Babes.
The concert, and day ended tragically, when a nearby nuclear power plant went into catastrophic meltdown and blasted the park with radiation.
